nodes.bodyText: Don't believe status can actually be null, if it can we should fix it to return unset in such cases in a separate PR.

I'm reading the attached issue https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-specification/pull/1186/files and can't find anything about this check, can you point me at it? IIUC we're supposed to set status even if not rpc.

can't find anything about this check

So do I
Can you help to confirm this? @Oberon00
This was definitely a holdover from when the statuses were so closely aligned with the GRPC status codes. Should be fine, I would think, to remove it. 👍
yes, status cannot be null here, so this extra check can be removed.
